name: @ebay/service-discovery-ebay
description: This module provides the ability to resolve service endpoints using service discovery.

scripts.test: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=test DEPLOY_ENV=test mocha --sort --reporter spec --timeout 10000  --require test/fixture/setversions.js test/*.js
scripts.coverage: rm -rf .beans .cache && NODE_ENV=test DEPLOY_ENV=test nyc --report-dir gh-pages/coverage --reporter=cobertura --reporter=html --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --sort --reporter spec --timeout 10000  --require test/fixture/setversions.js

author: Nitin Surana <nisurana@ebay.com>
